page.title: 07The Michelin factory,Hanford
page.content: The Michelin is a large tyre factory in Hanford.This factory provides jobs for lots of people.My dad works in the factory.He has worked there for 24 years.He puts metal wires into the tyres.He works shifts.Sometimes when I'm going to school in the morning he is just going to bed! Every year in the summer a race called the Michelin Ten takes place.My dad sometimes takes part in it. Earlier this year the Michelin had to make over 2,000 people redundant.Many people near to where I live lost their jobs.My dad was lucky,he is still working there. In my school,Boothen Primary,a quarter of the children have a relative who works for the Michelin.This shows how important the factory is in the area and how terrible the effect was of the recent job losses.
